column4: hi folks - I just managed to delete all pics off my girlfriends digicam... afaik it's a fat32 fs... I am currently doing a dd of the cam's card onto my pc - can I rescue them someway??
1st do a dd of the dev, then whatever you do you can always get the original/best data available.
doing just that at the moment... can you give me a hint what the next step would be??
there are some file forensic recovery tools listed here, http://blog.lxpages.com/2007/06/21/linux-file-recovery/
